rundown: 1-2 L vs Baltimore Orioles Grant Holmes: 6.0 innings, 2 earned runs, 4 hits, 1 HR, 5 strikeouts Batters: Sean Murphy (2 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Jurickson Profar (2 hits - 4 AB) Stuart Fairchild (2 hits - 3 AB) The Braves fell short against the Baltimore Orioles, managing only one run despite a solid performance from their starting pitcher. Key highlights include Sean Murphy's home run, which accounted for the Braves' only run, and a strong showing at the plate from Jurickson Profar and Stuart Fairchild, each contributing two hits. The Braves' inability to capitalize on their seven hits ultimately led to their defeat.
